effect.name: Audio Level Visualization Filter
effect.author: Meltytech, LLC
effect.description: An audio visualization filter that draws an audio level meter on the image.

parameter.name: type
Graph type
parameter.comment: The type of graph to display the levels.

parameter.name: bgcolor
Background Color
parameter.comment: The background color to be applied to the entire frame.

parameter.name: color.1
Gradient Color 1
parameter.comment: The color of the waveform gradient.

parameter.name: color.2
Gradient Color 2
parameter.comment: The color of the waveform gradient.

parameter.name: color.3
Gradient Color 3
parameter.comment: The color of the waveform gradient.

parameter.name: thickness
Line Thickness
parameter.comment: The thickness of the bar or segments.

parameter.name: angle
Angle
parameter.comment: The rotation angle to be applied to the waveform.

parameter.name: rect
Rectangle
parameter.comment: Defines the rectangle that the waveform(s) should be drawn in.

parameter.name: mirror
Mirror
parameter.comment: Mirror the spectrum about the center of the rectangle.

parameter.name: reverse
Reverse
parameter.comment: Draw the points starting with the right channel first.

parameter.name: channels
Channels
parameter.comment: The number of channels to show.

parameter.name: segment_gap
Segment Gap
parameter.comment: The space in pixels between the segments.
